rockerboy.name: Rockerboy
rockerboy.skillDescription: This skill allows Rocker to sway crowds equal to their ability level squared, times 200.

solo.name: Solo
solo.skillDescription: Added to all awareness checks, this makes the Solo the fastest reacting person in a situation.

netrunner.name: Netrunner
netrunner.skillDescription: Prevents access to the web from other persons.

techie.name: Techie
techie.skillDescription: This general repair skill allows the Techie to temporarily repair or alter anything for x turns per level of skill

media.name: Media
media.skillDescription: The ability to have people believe what you're saying while in your on-air persona.

cop.name: Cop
cop.skillDescription: The ability to intimidate or control others through your position as a lawman.

corporate.name: Corporate
corporate.skillDescription: This represents the corporates ability to command corporation resources. It is used as a persuasion skill, based on the scale of resources requested.

fixer.name: Fixer
fixer.skillDescription: The ability to locate people, information etc.

nomad.name: Nomad
nomad.skillDescription: This allows nomad to call in as many Family members to aid him as his current Family Ability level x 2.
